nodes.bodyText:
I saw the original author using
$.isFunction(this.config.events.onChange)
is it worth to keep it consistent?
I'm a JS noob. Can you clarify?
however, looking at the doc https://api.jquery.com/jQuery.isFunction/ the function is deprecated, so keep it as you have it
why is this no longer needed?
projects is always defined because RuntimeEnvironment does a new ArrayList.
